Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Compared to Col wt: rounder cotyledons and leaves, shorter petioles, shorter and wider flowers borne on shorter pedicels, flowers are clustered at the top of the inflorescence, shorter and wider siliques that have a blunt tip, shorter and wider inflorescence stems, compact inflorescence.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Weak allele.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Slightly altered organ shape, affecting the development of leaves, inflorescences, flowers and siliques expressed throughout much of the plant's life.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Compared to Col wt: rounder cotyledons and leaves, shorter petioles, shorter and wider flowers borne on shorter pedicels (pedicel length is about 80% of the wt), less severe phenotype is obvious in floral apices when compared with other strong alleles, slightly shorter and wider siliques with slightly blunt tips (silique length is about 90 % of the wt), shorter and wider inflorescence stems (plant heigth is about 80 % of wt), slightly compact inflorescence.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Intermediate allele.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Absence of trichomes on leaves and stems, some trichomes on leaf margins.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Compared to Ws wild type rounder cotyledons and leaves, shorter petioles, shorter and wider flowers borne on shorter pedicels, flowers are clustered at the top of the inflorescence, shorter and wider siliques that have a blunt tip, shorter and wider inflorescence stems, compact inflorescence.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Compact and short inflorescence.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Thick inflorescence stems.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Clustered flower buds at the top of the inflorescence without affecting phyllotaxis.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Increased number of flower buds at the first flowering.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Number of lateral inflorescences is not altered.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Blunt and short siliques.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Siliques have the same width as the wild type.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Leaves and roots are similar to wild type.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Intermediate phenotype (milder than Ler or erecta-105).

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Phb-13 phv-11 cna-2 triple mutants often displayed tri-cotyledons, enlarged SAM, stem fasciation, flowers with extra organs, silique enlargement, and reduced fertility.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Reduced flower diameter compared to tetraploid.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Increased flower diameter compared to diploid.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Plants exhibit reduced lateral shoot meristems (LSMs) of rosette and cauline leaves, meristem-defective flowers, altered leaf morphology (size and shape) and leaf color.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: The percentage of absent LSMs is correlated with the severity of leaf morphology and color, the severity of leaf morphology and color is also correlated with the % of meristem-defective flowers.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: However, the % of absent LSMs is independent of the % of meristem-defective flowers.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Altered leaf polarity.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Heterozygotes have leaves with adaxial epidermal characters (dark green, glossy, trichome- rich surfaces) around their circumference & exhibit varying degrees of radial symmetry & loss of blade outgrowth.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Some leaves rod like while others are shaped like trumpets (with adaxial tissue on outer surfaces & abaxial tissue on inside of 'bell' of trumpet), leaves grow nearly vertical rather than bending away from the plant.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: All four types of floral organs affected to some degree.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Transformation of abaxial to adaxial fates in leaves and leaf-like organs.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: The most severely affected organs develop with radial symmetry and exhibit adaxial traits around their circumference.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Plants appear superficially wild type in phenotype.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Shoot meristems at early developmental stages are significantly larger than wild-type meristems, giving the appearance of a corona or ring-like meristems.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: No visible phenotype.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Altered regulation of the activity of the vascular meristems.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Small rosette.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Rounded leaves.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Observed flowering time was 23 days after planting.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Short and wide siliques with blunt tip.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Observed flowering time was 22 days after planting.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Erecta null phenotype.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Lacks shoot apical meristem (SAM) in seedlings and embryos.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: True leaves do not develop.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Morphology is similar to torpedo stage embryo, indicating that mutant may be blocked in SAM formation.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Sensitive to UV light under photoreactivating conditions.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Leaves become necrotic and wither and plants have reduced growth rate under chronic UV light.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Defective in DNA repair (dimer repair).

Matches: Excessive asymmetric division and meristemoid formation in cotyledons.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Average height = 29 cm.

Query: Pale yellow seeds, no flavonoid in tapetum cells.
Matches: Angustifolia, Erecta.
